verses.content: Jehosaphat chun hausaknahai le inzâkaina chu nasatakin a nei a, chun, Ahab le chun inpum- khatna chu a siem tah a.

Kum ieng zât amani hnunga chun Ahab kuomah Samaria chun a zu fe thla a. Chun, Ahab chun ama le ama hung zuituhai ta dingin bâwng- chalhai le berâmhai tamtak a thatpêk a; chuongchun, ama le Ramoth- gileada hang fe dingin a fiel tah a.

Israel ram lal Ahab chun Juda ram lal Jehosaphat kuoma chun, “Ramoth-gileadah ei hang fe ding?” a ta. Ama chun, “Kei le nang ka mihai le i mihai pumkhat ei na; indonaa chun, nangni leh ṭhang hmunkhat kan tih,” a ta.
Jehosaphat chun Israel ram lal kuoma chun, “Vawisûn hin LALPA thu chu indawn raw khai, ka hni che hi,” a ta.

Chuongchun, Israel ram lal chun zâwlnei za li lai chu a ko khâwm a, an kuomah, “Ramoth-gileada chun indo dingin kan hang fe ding am, an- nawleh ka tosan el ding?” a ta. Anni chun, “Hang fe ro, Pathien chun lal kutah a pêk suok ding a ni sih a,” an ta.
Nisienlakhawm, Jehosaphat chun, “Hienghai naw hi ei râwn thei ding LALPA zâwlnei dang hrim an um naw am a nih?” a ta.

Israel lal chun Jehosaphat kûoma chun, “Mi pakhat LALPA thu ei indawn theina ding chu a la um a, amiruokchu, ama chu ka theidaa, ka chungthua hin thu a hril ṭha ngai hrim hrim nawh a, thil ṭha naw chau naw chu; chu mi chu Imla naupa Mikaia a nih,” a ta. Jehosaphat chun, “Lal chun chuong chun ti naw phawt raw se,” a ta.
Chun, Israel lal chun hotu pakhat a ko a, “Imla naupa Mikaia chu inhmâwtakin hung ṭhuoi rawh,” a ta.

Chun, Israel ram lal le Juda ram lal Jehosaphat chu, an lal puona inthuomin an lal ṭhungpha ve vea chun an ṭhung a; Samaria lûtna dai kawtkhâr bula tuollaia chun an ṭhung a, chuongchun, zâwlneihai po po chun an hmaa chun thu an hril ruol duol duol a.
Chun, Kenaan naupa Zedekia chun thîrin saki ân siem fâwm a, “LALPA chun hieng hin a tih, ‘Suk- bohmang an ni vawng hmakhat chu hienghai le hin Suria mihai chu i sik ding a nih,’ tiin,” a ta.
Chuongchun, zâwlneihai po po chun, chuong ang seng chun an hril tah a, “Ramoth-gileada chun hang fe la, hang hlawtling rawh, LALPA chun lal kuta chun a pêk suok ngei ding a ni sih a,” tiin.

Chun, thangko Mikaia ko ding- a fe khan a kuomah thu a hril a, “Ngai ta, thu bau khat angin zâwl- neihai thu chun lal ta dinga ṭha chu an hril seng a; chuleiin, ka hni che hi, nanga thu khawm chu anni hril ang bawk chu ni sienla, thu ṭha hril rawh,” tiin.
Mikaia chun, “LALPA chu a hring zing a, ka Pathienin a hril chu, chu chu ngei chu hril ka tih,” a ta.

Chun, lal kuom a hung tlung chun lal chun a kuomah, “Mikaia, Ramoth-gileada chun indo dingin kan hang fe ding am, annawleh ka tosan el ding?” a ta. Ama chun, “Hang fe la, hang hlawtling rawh, i kutah pêk suok an ni ding a nih,” a ta.
Chun, lal chun a kuoma, “LALPA hmingin thudik chau naw chu iengkhawm ka kâwlah i hril ngai nawh ti hi vawi iengzât rau am ka sukdetpui ding che a na?” a ta.

Ama chun, “Israel mihai po po chu, berâm a vêngtu boa, an invâk hmang angin tlângahai chun indarin ka hmuh a; chun, LALPA chun, ‘Hienghai hin vêngtu an nei nawh a, mi tin chu mâni in sengah thla- muongtakin inkîrtir seng ro,’ a tih,” tiin.
Chun, Israel ram lal chun Jehosaphat kuoma chun, “Keima chungthua chun a se tieng chau naw chu a ṭha tieng chun thu hril naw ni ti ka hril hrim che a ni naw am a nih?” a ta.
Chun, Mikaia chun a hril a, “Chuleichun, LALPA thu chu ngai rawh. LALPA chu a lalṭhungphaa chun ṭhung a, vân sipaihai po po chu a changtieng le a vawitienga ngîr ka hmu a nih.

Chun, LALPA chun, ‘Israel ram lal Ahab chu Ramoth-gileada chun a hang fe a, chutaka chun a hang thi theina dingin tuin am thlêm a ta?’ a ta. Chun, mi pakhat chun chuong ang chun a hril a, mi dang khawmin chuong ang bawk chun an hung hril pei a.
Chun, thlarau pakhat chu a hung suok a, LALPA hmaa chun a ngîr a, ‘Keiin hang thlêm ka tih,’ a ta. Chun, LALPA chun, ‘Iengtinam ie?’ a ta.

Ama chun, ‘Hang fêng ka ta, a zâwlnei po pohai baua chun thlarau inkhêl hang nîng ka tih,’ a ta. Chun, ama chun, ‘Ama chu thlêm ngei i ta, hlaw khawm hang hlawtling ngei i tih; fe suok la, chuong ang tak chun hang thaw rawh,’ a ta.
Chuleiin, tuhin ngai ta, hieng i zâwlneihai baua hin khêl hrilna thla- rau a sie tah a; chuleichun, LALPA chun i chungthua chun thil ṭha naw chu a hril tah a nih,” tiin.
Chun, Kenaan naupa Zedekia chu a hung hnai a, “Keimaa inthawk- in i kuoma thu hril dingin LALPA thlarau chu khaw tieng am a fe leh?” tiin, Mikaia chu a bienga chun a ben tah a.
Chun, Mikaia chun, “Ngai ta, pindan sûngrila inbihmang dinga i fe pha, chu ni ngei chun la hrieng i tih,” a ta.
Chun, Israel lal chun, “Mikaia hi man unla, khawpui enkawltu Amon kuoma chun ṭhuoi nâwk ro; lal naupa Joas kuoma le chun;
chun, ‘Hi mipa hi lunginah sie unla, thlamuongtaka ka hung nâwk hmakhat chun rimsikna tui le rim- sikna beiin ama hi châwm ro,’ lalin a tih, ti ro,” a ta.
Chun, Mikaia chun, “Thla- muongtaka i hung nâwk hrim hrim chun, LALPAIN kei mi hmangin thu a hril naw nîng a tih,” a ta. Chun, “Mipuihai, nangni po poin lo hre ta u,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Israel ram lal le Juda ram lal Jehosaphat chu Ramoth- gileada chun an hang fe tah a.

Chun, Israel lal chun Jehosa- phat kuoma chun, “Insukdanglam ka ta, indonaah hang fêng ka tih; amiruokchu, nang chu i lal puon sil zing la,” a ta. Chuongchun, Israel lal chu ân sukdanglam a, indonaa chun an hang fe tah a.
Chun, Suria lal chun sakawr tawlailîrhai hotuhai kuoma chun, “Israel lal ngat naw chu mi lien amanih, mi chîn amani khawm chu va do naw ro,” tiin thu a pêk a.

Chun, sakawr tawlailîr hotuhai chun Jehosaphat chu an hmu chun, “Israel lal a nih a,” an ta. Chuleiin, ama chu do dingin an inhuol tah a; amiruokchu, Jehosaphat chu a khêk a, LALPA chun ama chu a ṭhangpui tah a; chuongchun, amaa inthawka inkieng dingin Pathien chun a hung thaw tah a.
Chun, sakawr tawlailîr hotuhai chun Israel lal a ni nawh ti an hmu chun, ama an hnawt lai chu an kîrsan tah a.

Chun, mi tuin amanih tum bîk nei loin a thalngul chu a kuoi a, Israel lal chu a râlthuom inzawmna kâr taka chun a kâp tah a; chuleichun, a tawlailîr khaltu kuoma chun, “Kei her la, sipaihai laia inthawk hi mi fe suokpui raw khai, ka hliem nasa êm el,” a ta.
Chu ni chun indona chu a zuol pei a, ngai ta, Israel lal chu Suriahai chu doin a tawlailîra chun zântieng chenin a ṭhang zing a; chun, ama chu nisa tlâk hun lai taka hin a thi tah a.
